meaningMnemonic:
You are going to <kanji>release</kanji> and <kanji>send</kanji> something out. Imagine this message going out through the sky to everyone around you. You are going <vocabulary>to broadcast something</vocabulary> to the world! 

The する is on there to make this noun a verb. Without the する it would be the noun "broadcast."
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
